NSM Better Meta is an ExpressionEngine extension that allows you to optimise your entry meta without setting up tedious custom fields and complicated templates. Easy to use, and fully documented it's a must have ExpressionEngine addon.

The problem

The out of the box ExpressionEngine way of adding specific meta to an entry involves creating multiple custom fields for each channel. Not too bad for one channel but what if you have 10 channels and 10 custom field meta tags, before you know it you've created 100 extra custom fields! Then you have to implement those in your templates using advanced conditionals.

Wouldn't it just be easier to enter your entry meta in a custom publish tab and then add a single tag to your sites header with a couple of parameters?

Features

  • Customisable Publish Form tab: Enter entry specific meta in a customisable publish form tab without setting up custom fields. Customise the tab to show only the meta fields your publishers need.
  • XML sitemaps: Generate XML sitemaps with change frequency and priority for search engine crawlers.
  • Multi-Site Manager compatible: Independent extension settings for each site
  • NSM Addon Updater compatible: Stay up-to-date with the latest versions of NSM Better Meta
